# DIY Particles - Update Summary (December 7, 2025)

- Renamed from "Atmosphere+" to "DIY Particles"
- Expanded slider ranges — offset ±10 blocks, radius up to 20, lifetime up to 30s
- Aether Lens removed — emitters visible with Tuner Wand or Emitter block
- Shareable preset codes — export/import creations via text codes
- Grayscale textures with smart color defaults — Leaf auto-sets green, etc.
- Fixed disc emission shape — was incorrectly using sphere geometry
- Added Alpha blend mode — sharp edges option alongside Blend and Glow
- 9 particle files total — shape × blend combinations
- Collision toggle now bounces particles off blocks instead of deleting them
- Added more rotation settings: spin speed and random start angle
- Added toggle to enable/disable particle fading out over lifetime
